title: Thursday’s best deals: M1 MacBook Air $70 off, AirPods Pro from $140, more
content:
Headlining all of Thursday’s best Apple deals, the latest M1 MacBook Air has received a rare Amazon discount. That’s alongside AirPods Pro on sale from $140 and these ongoing Eve smart home markdowns. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

description: Latest 13-inch M1 MacBook Air discount has launched at Amazon with $70 off in today's best Apple deals. Plus AirPods Pro markdowns.
